See also {bitmu}, {snuji}, {senta}, {fendi}, {curve}, {jinsa}, {bitmu}, {marbi}.
$x_{1}$ (du'u) [fact/measurement] is data/information/statistic(s) about $x_{2}$ gathered by method $x_{3}$.
s|Evidence (= velji'i datni or just {velji'i}, {sidydatni}). See also {fatci}, {saske}, {vreji}.
$x_{1}$ dreams about/that $x_{2}$ (fact/idea/event/state); $x_{2}$ is a dream/reverie of $x_{1}$.
$x_{1}$ is a layer/stratum [shape/form] of $x_{2}$ [material] within structure/continuum/composite $x_{3}$.
s|Also: $x_2$ is doubtful/dubious/questionable (= {selsenpi} for reordered places).  See also {jinvi}, {krici}, {djuno}, {birti}.
$x_{1}$ is a tenth [1/10; $10^{-1}$] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).

s|(cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, dekto, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, picti, terto, xatsi, xecto, xexso, zepti, zetro)
$x_{1}$ reflects Semitic [metaphor: Middle-Eastern] language/culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
s|Semitic includes Arabic, Hebrew, Aramaic, and Ethiopian, among others.  See also {xrabo}.
s|$x_{1}$ is a/the language/dialect used by $x_{2}$ to express/communicate $x_{3}$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).
$x_{1}$ (agent) serves $x_{2}$ with service $x_{3}$ (activity); $x_{1}$ is a servant (noun) of $x_{2}$ performing $x_{3}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is a cell/atom/unit/molecule of $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is an indivisible, most basic subunit of $x_{2}$.
s|($x_2$ generally has mass nature); (cf. {kantu} for properties, activities; {ratni}, {gradu})
$x_{1}$ is a/the finger/digit/toe [body-part] on limb/body site $x_{2}$ of body $x_{3}$; [metaphor: peninsula].
s|$x_{1}$ owes $x_{2}$ in debt/obligation to creditor $x_{3}$ in return for $x_{4}$ [service, loan]; $x_{1}$ is a debtor.
s|$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ (default 1) local volume unit(s) [non-metric; e.g. bushel], standard $x_{3}$, $x_{4}$ subunits.

s|Gallon (= {likydekpu}), quart (= {likseldekpu}), barrel (wet = likybradekpu, dry = sudbradekpu), bushel (= {sudydekpu}), peck (= {sudyseldekpu}), cupful (= {kabrydekpu}), tablespoon (= {mucydekpu}); teaspoon (= {mucyxeldekpu}); (all of these lujvo may need gic- to distinguish the English measurement system in contrasting with some local system; the English system is otherwise presumed to be the default non-metric system).  (additional subunit places may be added as $x_5$, $x_6$, ...); See also {canlu}, {litce}, {rupnu}, {fepni}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}, {kramu}.
s|$x_{1}$ is surface/face [bounded shape/form] of [higher-dimension] object $x_{2}$, on side $x_{3}$, edges $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is ten [10; $10^1$ ] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ candela [metric unit] in luminosity (default is 1) by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a bean/pea/leguminous seed from plant [legume] $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the tooth [body-part] of $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is dental.
$x_{1}$ is a noise/din/clamor [sensory input without useful information] to $x_{2}$ via sensory channel $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is dense/concentrated/packed/intense in property $x_{2}$ (ka) at location/locus $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ awaits/waits/pauses for/until $x_{2}$ at state $x_{3}$ before starting/continuing $x_{4}$ (activity/process).
s|($x_2$ is an event, usually a point event); also: resuming $x_4$.  See also {dicra}, {fanmo}, {sisti}, {fliba}, {pandi}.
$x_{1}$ [measurement/match] is exact/precise to precision $x_{2}$ in property/quantity $x_{3}$ (ka/ni).
$x_{1}$ (mass of facts) is science of/about subject matter $x_{2}$ based on methodology $x_{3}$.

s|Not limited to science as derived by the scientific method, but pertaining to any body of usually-coherent knowledge garnered/gathered/assembled by a consistent methodology.  See also {datni}, {fatci}, {djuno}, {cipra}, {pensi}, {jimpe}.
$x_{1}$ is harmonious/concordant/in agreement/concord with $x_{2}$ in property $x_{3}$ (ka).
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of dirt/soil/earth/ground from source $x_{2}$ of composition $x_{3}$.
s|Also: $x_1$ is earthen; $x_3$: composition including $x_3$, which need not be exhaustive of composition.  See also {kliti}, {terdi}, {loldi}.
s|$x_{1}$ is a spiral/helix/whorl/[vortex] [shape/form] with limits $x_{2}$, of dimensionality $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ supports/holds up/is underpinning of/[helps] $x_{2}$ against force/opposition $x_{3}$ with/by means $x_{4}$.

s|Also aids; (adjective:) $x_1$ is dependable, reliable (such reliability may be transient; this is not the usual sense of 'reliable' or 'dependable'); ($x_2$ is object/event).  See also {bradi}, {darlu}, {fapro}, {sidju}, {tugni}, {bongu}, {ckana}, {cpana}, {loldi}, {sanli}, {selfu}.
$x_{1}$ (abstract) is necessary/required for continuing state/process $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$.
s|Also factually necessary, necessity, prerequisite, condition, precondition.  See also cmavo list {sau}, {nitcu}.
$x_{1}$ is a heap/pile/stack/mound/hill of materials $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is an umbrella/parasol shielding $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$, made of material $x_{4}$, supported by $x_{5}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is a sauce/topping/gravy/frosting for use with $x_{2}$, containing ingredient(s) including $x_{3}$.
s|$x_3$ is in $x_1$, an ingredient/part/component of sauce $x_1$.  See also {sanmi}, {mixre}, {stasu}.
$x_{1}$ (mass) is a meal composed of dishes including $x_{2}$.
s|$x_2$ is a course/dish of meal $x_1$ (= {selsai} for reordered places).  See also {barja}, {stasu}, {gusta}, {sanso}.
$x_{1}$ stands [is vertically oriented] on surface $x_{2}$ supported by limbs/support/pedestal $x_{3}$.

s|$x_1$ is standing; $x_1$ stands up; $x_1$ is erect/vertical/upright; $x_1$ bows/bends over (= {krosa'i}, {krosa'ibi'o}, {plosa'i}); frame of reference is (approximate) perpendicularity to the surface, and not to a gravity field.  See also {kamju}, {sraji}, {tuple}, {zbepi}, {sarji}.

s|[also: $x_1$ knows Of. $x_2$ (one sense); awareness implies some amount of mental processing above and beyond mere sensory detection, and may also be applied to mental relationships that are not detected by the senses]; See also {menli}, {morji}, {ganse}, {sipna}, {cikna}.
s|Melody (= {sagzgi}, {ralsagzgi}), harmony (= {saxsagzgi}), harmonize/sing harmony (= {saxsa'a}), song (= {selsa'a}).  See also {pemci}, {rimni}, {rilti}, {siclu}.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of cassava/taro/manioc/tapioca/yam [edible starchy root] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ (mass) is a quantity of salad [food] with ingredients/components including $x_{2}$.
s|$x_2$ is in $x_1$, an ingredient/part/component of $x_1$.  See also {mixre}, {stasu}.
s|Also (expressible either with desku or slilu): side to side, to and fro, back and forth, reciprocal motion.  See also {slilu}, {janbe}.
$x_{1}$ is sloped/inclined/slanted/aslant with angle $x_{2}$ to horizon/frame $x_{3}$.
s|Also steep (= {tcesa'o}); normally implies non-rectilinear.  See also {kurfa}, {tutci}.
s|$x_{1}$ is the date [day,{week},{month},year] of event/state $x_{2}$, at location $x_{3}$, by calendar $x_{4}$.
s|(time units in $x_1$ are specified as numbers separated by pi'e or are unit values massified with joi); See also cmavo list {de'i}, {djedi}, {jeftu}, {masti}, {nanca}, {tcika}.

s|$x_3$ (and {nunsla}) festival/fiesta/celebration/occasion/fair/Holiday (some senses). Not limited to the ameliorative interpretation of 'celebrate': funeral (= {mrobixsla}).  See also {sinma}, {jbena}.
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of sugar [sweet edible] from source $x_{2}$ of composition $x_{3}$.

s|Also sucrose, fructose, glucose, galactose, lactose, etc.; saccharine/aspartame/sugar substitute ({basysakta} or {satybasti}, {ticysakta}); $x_3$: composition including $x_3$, which need not be complete specification.  See also {silna}, {titla}.
s|$x_2$ is slick/slippery to/for $x_1$ (= {selsakli} for reordered places).  See also {mosra}, {fulta}, {skiji}, {xutla}.
$x_{1}$ sucks/is suction/vacuum/relatively low pressure of fluid/gas $x_{2}$ relative to high pressure $x_{3}$.
s|Also suck object/fluid (= {sakcpu} or {sakmuvgau}).  See also {cokcu}, {lacpu}, {flecu}.
$x_{1}$ is electricity [electric charge or current] in/on $x_{2}$ of polarity/quantity $x_{3}$ (def. negative).

s|($x_3$, a quantifier, can be expressed as a simple polarity using the numerals for positive and negative ma'u and ni'u); (explicitly) negative (= {dutydikca}), positive (= {mardikca}); current (= {selmuvdikca}, {muvdikca}; again default negative/electron current), charge (= {klodikca}, {stadikca}).  See also {lindi}, {xampo}, {flecu}, {maksi}, {tcana}.
$x_{1}$ is local to $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is confined to locus $x_{2}$ within range $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is regional

s|Indicates a specific location/value within a range; e.g. a hits b.  What is the locality on b that a hits?  Thus $x_1$ is associated with a specific narrow region/interval $x_2$ of wider space/range $x_3$.  See also cmavo list {di'o}, {jibni}, {zvati}, {cpana}, {nenri}, {lamji}, {stuzi}, {tcila}.
$x_{1}$ is regular/cyclical/periodic in property (ka)/activity $x_{2}$ with period/interval $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ reflects Saudi Arabian culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is a quotient of '$x_{2}$/$x_{3}$' [dividend $x_{2}$ divided by divisor $x_{3}$], leaving remainder $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ (me'o) is the [decimal/binary] equivalent of fractional $x_{2}$ (me'o) in base $x_{3}$ (quantity).
s|Conversion from fractions to decimal-point based notation. See also {namcu}, {frinu}.
$x_{1}$ is a match [incendiary device] made of $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a cloud/mass of clouds of material $x_{2}$ in air mass $x_{3}$ at floor/base elevation $x_{4}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is a fate/destiny of $x_{2}$; [doom, curse are mabla-forms]; $x_{2}$ is fated/predestined/doomed to $x_{1}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is a nail/tack [pointed driven/frictional fastener] of type/size $x_{2}$ (ka), made of material $x_{3}$.
s|($x_2$ also can be ni abstraction); See also {pijne}, {lasna}.
$x_{1}$ is an artifact; $x_{1}$ is artificial; $x_{1}$ is made/caused by people/se kulnu $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is man-made.
s|$x_{1}$ is measured in major-money-units (dollar/yuan/ruble) as $x_{2}$ (quantity), monetary system $x_{3}$.
s|Also pound, rupee, franc, mark, yen; $x_1$ is generally a price/cost/value.  See also {jdini}, {sicni}, {jdima}, {vecnu}, {fepni}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}, {kramu}.
$x_{1}$ is dear/precious/darling to $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is emotionally valued by $x_{2}$.

s|$x_1$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posydirba} for unambiguous semantics).  See also {tcika}, {kargu}, {vamji}, {vajni}, {pleji}, {jadni}, {jemna}.
$x_{1}$ dissolves in solvent $x_{2}$ forming solution/[suspension] $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ melts [becomes liquid from solid state] at temperature $x_{2}$ and pressure $x_{3}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is a drop [small, cohesive shape] of material [liquid/vapor] $x_{2}$ in surrounding material $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is low/down/downward in frame of reference $x_{2}$ as compared with baseline/standard height $x_{3}$.
s|Also lower; $x_3$ is generally some defined distance above a zero point/baseline, or is that baseline itself.  See also {cnita}, {galtu}, {gapru}, {farna}, {loldi}.
$x_{1}$ is weak/feeble/frail in property/quality/aspect $x_{2}$ (ka) by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity/expanse of water; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is aqueous/[aquatic].
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ full days in duration (default is 1 day) by standard $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is diurnal.
$x_{1}$ is a rose [flower - characterized by prickly stem/fragrance] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
s|Roses are not all pink; avoid using for color rose, which might be {labyxu'e}.  See also {spati}, {xunre}.

s|If desire is for an object, this is sumti-raising; use tu'a in $x_2$ (or use lujvo = {po'edji}).  See also {taske}, {xagji}, {mukti}, {nitcu}, {nelci}, {pacna}, {prami}, {rigni}, {trina}, {xebni}, {xlura}.
$x_{1}$ is thick in dimension/direction $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$; [relatively long in smallest dimension].
s|$x_{1}$ is a ring/annulus/torus/circle [shape/form] of material $x_{2}$, inside diam. $x_{3}$, outside diam. $x_{4}$.

s|Also ellipse, oval (= {jincla}); (usage has been for near-circles, such as tight spirals, even if not closed loops).  Also band, belt, encircle (= {jinsru}).  See also {clupa}, {cukla}, {dasri}, {karli}, {sovda}, {sruri}, {konju}.
$x_{1}$ knows fact(s) $x_{2}$ (du'u) about subject $x_{3}$ by epistemology $x_{4}$.

s|Words usable for epistemology typically have a du'u place; know how to - implying knowledge of method but not necessarily having the ability to practice (= {tadjyju'o}). 'know/familiar with' - {se} {slabu}, {na'e} {cnino}, {na'e} {fange}. See also {du'o}, {krici}, {jinvi}, {cilre}, {certu}, {facki}, {jijnu}, {jimpe}, {senpi}, {smadi}, {kakne}, {birti}, {mipri}, {morji}, {saske}, {viska}.
$x_{1}$ is the daytime of day $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is diurnal (vs. nocturnal).
s|$x_{1}$ is a highly reflective/polished non-tarnishing metallic surface, of metal $x_{2}$ [often chromium].
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/is made of/contains rock/stone of type/composition $x_{2}$ from location $x_{3}$.
s|$x_2$: composition including $x_2$, which need not be complete specification. See also {kunra}, {jemna}, {canre}.
$x_{1}$ is a drama/play about $x_{2}$ [plot/theme/subject] by dramatist $x_{3}$ for audience $x_{4}$ with actors $x_{5}$.
s|$x_2$ may also be a convention. See also {finti}, {cukta}, {lisri}, {cfika}.
$x_{1}$ is correct/proper/right/perfect in property/aspect $x_{2}$ (ka) in situation $x_{3}$ by standard $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ isn't the-same-thing-as/is different-from/other-than $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is something else.
s|(cf. {bitmu}, {stedu}, {galtu}, {gapru}, {loldi}, {marbi}, {gacri}, {mapku}; a drudi is (designed to be) over/above something and shelters it from other things above the drudi, mapku)
$x_{1}$ is the logarithm of $x_{2}$ with base $x_{3}$.

s|Also detours around, stays away from; ($x_1$ is normally an object, but may be an event).  See also bandu which is not necessarily successful, {fanta}, which is agentive, se jersi which implies an opposing agent, {sisku}, {kalte}, {fapro}.
$x_{1}$ is an excess of/too much of $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is a rite/ceremony/ritual for purpose/goal $x_{2}$, by custom/in community $x_{3}$, with form/rules $x_{4}$.
s|[also: $x_1$ is formal, Legal.  $x_1$ is 'going through the motions']; $x_4$ constraints/customs; See also {lijda}, {malsi}, {flalu}, {javni}, {tcaci}, {clite}, {junri}.
$x_{1}$ is a/the heart [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [emotional/shape metaphors are NOT culturally neutral].
s|(adjective:) $x_1$ is cardiac; emotional 'heart' (= {cnise'i}).  See also {pambe}, {ciblu}.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of rice [a type of grain] of strain/cultivar $x_{2}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is a river of land mass $x_{2}$, draining watershed $x_{3}$ into $x_{4}$/terminating at $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is a parent of/raises/rears $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ mentors/acts parental toward child/protege $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is polar opposite from/contrary to $x_{2}$ in property/on scale $x_{3}$ (property/si'o).
$x_{1}$ [member] is rare/unusual/uncommon/atypical in property $x_{2}$ (ka) among members of $x_{3}$ (set).
s|($x_3$ is complete specification of set); (cf. {cizra}, {fadni}, {cafne}, {kampu}, {cnano} - the generalized opposite to any/all of these concepts)

s|Also grants; $x_3$ is a receiver (= {terdu'a} for reordered places); the Lojban doesn't distinguish between or imply possession transfer or sharing; $x_2$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posydu'a}, {posyseldu'a} for unambiguous semantics).  See also {benji}, {muvdu}, {canja}, {pleji}, {vecnu}, {friti}, {sfasa}, {dapma}, {cnemu}, {prali}.
$x_{1}$ (agent) greets/hails/[welcomes/says hello to]/responds to arrival of $x_{2}$ in manner $x_{3}$ (action).
s|(cf. {friti} for welcome/hospitality, cmavo list {coi}, cmavo list {co'o})
s|$x_1$ is a material condition for $x_2$; $x_1$ gives rise to $x_2$.  See also {gasnu}, {krinu}, {nibli}, te {zukte}, se {jalge}, {bapli}, {jitro}, cmavo list {ri'a}, {mukti}, {ciksi}, {xruti}.

s|Also: $x_2$ is a restraint/binding for $x_1$, $x_2$ keeps/restrains/holds [back]/constrains $x_1$ from $x_3$ (= {selri'u} for reordered places); agentive restraint (= {ri'urgau}, {ri'urzu'e}).  See also {zifre}, {ralte}, {pinfu}, {kavbu}, {fanta}, {jgari}, {jimte}, {bapli}, {curmi}, {kluza}, {tagji}.
$x_{1}$ liquid/fluid drains/strains/flushes from source $x_{2}$ through drain/strainer $x_{3}$ by force $x_{4}$.
s|$x_4$ is usually gravity.  See also {pambe}, {tisna}, {setca}, {flecu}, {muvdu}, {ganxo}, {rirxe}.
s|$x_{1}$ rhymes/alliterates with $x_{2}$ in language/phonetics $x_{3}$, matching sound correspondence $x_{4}$ (ka).
s|Broad meaning of rhyme - any matching sound correspondence.  See also {pemci}, {sanga}.
$x_{1}$ (sequence/non-text quote) is a rhythm/beat of music/expressive form $x_{2}$.
s|Not necessarily oscillatory/regular pattern.  See also {damri}, {pemci}, {tonga}, {zgike}, {slilu}, {dikni}, {sanga}, {morna}.
s|$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of silver/argentum (Ag); [metaphor: valuable, tarnishing].
$x_{1}$ is repugnant to/causes disgust to $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is equal/congruent to/as much as $x_{2}$ in property/dimension/quantity $x_{3}$.

s|Same in quantity/quality (not necessarily in identity); 'analogy' may be expressed as the equivalence of two properties of similarity (ka $x_1$ simsa $x_2$) and (ka $x_3$ simsa $x_4$). See also {du'i}, {satci}, {frica}, {simsa}, {mintu}.
$x_{1}$ is winter/wintertime [cold season] of year $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is an elder/ancestor of $x_{2}$ by bond/tie/degree $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$'s generation precedes $x_{2}$'s parents.
$x_{1}$ [member] is ordinary/common/typical/usual in property $x_{2}$ (ka) among members of $x_{3}$ (set).

s|Also: $x_2$ is a normal/common/ordinary/typical property among set $x_3$ (= selterfadni for reordered places); also regular, (mabla forms:) banal, trite, vulgar; ($x_3$ is complete set).  See also {cafne}, {rirci}, {kampu}, {lakne}, {tcaci}, {cnano}.
$x_{1}$ is a fire/flame in fuel $x_{2}$ burning-in/reacting-with oxidizer $x_{3}$ (default air/oxygen).
s|Also lasts out, withstands; $x_1$ persists/lasts for duration $x_3$; (adjective:) $x_1$ is tough/durable.  See also {ranji}, {kuspe}, {randa}, {lifri}, {stali}, {temci}.
$x_{1}$ throws/launches/casts/hurls $x_{2}$ to/at/in direction $x_{3}$ (propulsion derives internally to $x_{1}$).
$x_{1}$ is a human/human being/man (non-specific gender-free sense); (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is human.
$x_{1}$ is a sail for gathering propelling material $x_{2}$ on vehicle/motor $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is an aunt/uncle of $x_{2}$ by bond/tie $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is an associated member of $x_{2}$'s parent's generation.
$x_{1}$ is a function/single-valued mapping from domain $x_{2}$ to range $x_{3}$ defined by expression/rule $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains meat/flesh from source/animal $x_{2}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is a/the tail/appendix [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: trailing, following portion/appendage].
s|For the sense of alien (not from Earth), see {kesfange}. See also {cizra}, {jbena}, {ckini}.
$x_{1}$ is an end/finish/termination of thing/process $x_{2}$; [not necessarily implying completeness].

s|$x_1$ is final/last/at the last; $x_1$ is a terminal/terminus of $x_2$; $x_1$ is the final/terminated state of terminated process $x_2$; $x_2$ terminates/ceases/stops/halts at $x_1$ (= {selfa'o} for reordered places).  See also {krasi}, {cfari}, {mulno}, {sisti}, {denpa}, {jipno}, {kojna}, {traji}.
$x_{1}$ is a factory/foundry/industrial plant/mill producing $x_{2}$ from materials $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is an atom of element/atomic number $x_{2}$ of isotope number/atomic weight $x_{3}$.
s|(cf. {kantu} for a basic unit of a property or activity; {selci} for a basic physical subunit, generally of a mass)
$x_{1}$ translates text/utterance $x_{2}$ to language $x_{3}$ from language $x_{4}$ with translation result $x_{5}$.
s|See also {cusku}, {bangu}. {traduki} is similar but has a different place structure.
s|$x_{1}$ is natural/spontaneous/instinctive, not [consciously] caused by person(s).
$x_{1}$ [action] repeats/is repeated for a total of $x_{2}$ (quantity) occurrences.
s|Also: is disruptive to.  See also {fengu}, {raktu}, {dicra}, {tunta}, {zunti}, {jicla}.
$x_{1}$ is ironic(al)/contrary to expectation $x_{2}$ in state/property/aspect $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is soft/malleable/moldable/yielding to force $x_{2}$ in conditions $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of bronze of composition including $x_{2}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is a myth/legend, a culturally significant story about $x_{2}$ in mythos $x_{3}$ of culture $x_{4}$.

s|Also: $x_1$ is mythical/fairy tale; used adjectivally for non-humanoid creatures (= {ramda'u}) of story/myth/legend/religion, e.g. dragon; fairy tale (= {veryranmi}).  See also {lijda}, {lisri}, {crida}.
$x_{1}$ (event/state) continues/persists over interval $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ (property - ka) is continuous over $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the body organ [body-part] of body/species $x_{2}$ performing function $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ falls/drops to $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$ in gravity well/frame of reference $x_{4}$.
s|Note: things can fall in spin, thrust, or tide as well as gravity; (agentive "drop" = one of two lujvo: {falcru} and {falri'a}). See also {lafti}, {cpare}, {klama}, {sfubu}.
s|$x_{1}$ is principal/chief/leader/main/[staple], most significant among $x_{2}$ (set) in property $x_{3}$ (ka).

s|Staple (= {ralselpra}); general/admiral/president/principal leader (= {ralja'a}, {ralterbe'e}; use additional terms to distinguish among these); also primary, prime, (adverb:) chiefly, principally, mainly; ($x_2$ is complete specification of set).  See also {vajni}, te {bende}, {minde}, {lidne}, {jatna}, {jitro}, {gidva}, {midju}.
s|Easily damaged or rendered less pleasing/pure/effective.  See also {jdari}, {ranti}, {tsali}, {milxe}, {kukte}.

s|Also afflicts, is disruptive to, troublesome; $x_1$/$x_3$ are a care to $x_2$, $x_2$ is troubled by/cares about $x_1$/$x_3$ (= {selra'u} for reordered places).  See also {dicra}, {fanza}, {zunti}, {kurji}, {xanka}, {nabmi}.
$x_{1}$ is the direction of $x_{2}$ (object/event) from origin/in frame of reference $x_{3}$.
s|$x_2$ is towards $x_1$ from $x_3$ (= {selfa'a} for reordered places).  See also {zunle}, {pritu}, {galtu}, {gapru}, {cnita}, {dizlo}, {berti}, {snanu}, {stuna}, {stici}, {purci}, {balvi}, {lidne}.
$x_{1}$ (event) is an event that happens/occurs/takes place; $x_{1}$ is an incident/happening/occurrence.
$x_{1}$ is located across/on the other side of gap/boundary $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is opposite (fi) $x_{3}$.

s|Also: $x_1$ is over there (across/beyond zo'e); directly across/beyond a boundary/gap, generally at the shortest plausible distance on the other side of the boundary.  See also {dukti}, {kuspe}, {bancu}, {kruca}, {cripu}, {pagre}.
s|$x_{1}$ (du'u) is a fact/reality/truth/actuality, in the absolute.
s|$x_{1}$ is an affix/suffix/prefix/combining-form for word/concept $x_{2}$, form/properties $x_{3}$, language $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ [sequence] is in reverse order from $x_{2}$ [sequence]; $x_{1}$ (object) is inverted from $x_{2}$ (object).
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ radian(s) [metric unit] in angular measure (default is 1) by standard $x_{3}$.

s|Measured in degrees ({julra'o}); right ascension astronomical measurement. (= {cacryra'o}).  See also {jganu}, {kilto}, {centi}, {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {gutci}, {litce}, {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti}, {minli}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.
$x_{1}$ is distributed/allotted/allocated/shared among $x_{2}$ with shares/portions $x_{3}$; ($x_{2}$/$x_{3}$ fa'u).
s|Also spread, shared out, apportioned; agentive distribution (= {fairgau}, {fairzu'e}). See also {fa'u}, {fendi}, {preja}, {katna}, {tcana}.
$x_{1}$ is $10^{-15}$ of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$x_{1}$ (action/event) is crazy/insane/mad/frantic/in a frenzy (one sense) by standard $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a garden/tended/cultivated field of family/community/farmer $x_{2}$ growing plants/crop $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is in the past of/earlier than/before $x_{2}$ in time sequence; $x_{1}$ is former; $x_{2}$ is latter.

s|Time ordering only (use lidne otherwise); aorist in that $x_1$ may overlap in time with $x_2$ as long as it starts before, $x_1$ starts before $x_2$ but is continuing during $x_2$ (= {cfaprucabna}); non-aorist before, i.e. $x_1$ is over/ended before $x_2$ starts (= {fampru}), $x_1$ is completed before $x_2$ starts (= {mulpru}).  See also {lidne}, {balvi}, {cabna}, {farna}.
s|$x_{1}$ sews/stitches/sutures materials $x_{2}$ (ind./set) together with tool(s) $x_{3}$, using filament $x_{4}$.
s|($x_2$ if a set must be a complete specification); See also {cilta}, {jivbu}, {jorne}, {nivji}, {pijne}, {lasna}.
s|$x_{1}$ is a swelling/protrusion/convexity [shape/form] at/in/on $x_{2}$, of material $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a pulley [tool] for performing action/function $x_{2}$ rotating on axle $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a police officer/[enforcer/vigilante] enforcing law(s)/rule(s)/order $x_{2}$.

s|Police officer, as an agent of authority (= {ca'irpulji}, {ka'irpulji}), as part of a police force (= {puljysoi}, as part of {puljyselsoi}); military police (= {jempulji}, {bilpulji}).  See also {catni}, {sonci}, {bilni}, {flalu}, {bandu}, {jemna}, {zekri}, {krati}.
$x_{1}$ is dust/precipitate [suspensible solid] from $x_{2}$ in medium/on surface $x_{3}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is measured in kopeck/cent money-subunits as $x_{2}$ [quantity], in monetary system $x_{3}$.

s|Also pfennig, paisa, sen, fen, dinar, etc.; $x_1$ is generally a price/cost/value.  (additional secondary, tertiary, etc. subunit places may be added as $x_4$, $x_5$, $x_6$, ...); See also {sicni}, {jdini}, {jdima}, {vecnu}, {rupnu}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}, {kramu}.
$x_{1}$ is a/the lung [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: breathing/respiratory apparatus/bellows].
$x_{1}$ is fertile/conducive for supporting the growth/development of $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is fruitful/prolific.
s|Also fecund (note that the Lojban covers both potential and actual/realized fertility).  See also {vanbi}, {sidju}, {rorci}, {farvi}, {banro}, {cange}.
$x_{1}$(s) is/are waste product(s) [left to waste] by $x_{2}$ (event/activity).
s|Also shit, crap; agentive wasting (= {fesygau}, {fesyzu'e}).  See also {xaksu}, {kalci}, {pinca}.
$x_{1}$ is spiritual/pertains to the soul in nature [either energy or being]; $x_{1}$ is ghostly/ethereal.
$x_1$ is a female/doe of species $x_2$ evidencing feminine physical/biological/genetic trait(s) $x_3$ (ka); $x_1$ is feminine.
s|See also {nakni}. For culturally female traits, see {jikyfetsi}.
s|$x_{1}$ is a process with inputs $x_{2}$, outputs/results $x_{3}$, passing through steps/stages $x_{4}$.
s|$x_2$ resource (= {selru'e}, but also {ru'etci}, (ru'er-/ruc- or selru'e-/selruc- modifying:) selxaksu, selsabji, livla).  See also cmavo list {pu'e}, {farvi}, {tadji}, {grute}, {tcini}.
$x_{1}$ is prose about plot/theme/subject $x_{2}$ by author $x_{3}$ for intended audience $x_{4}$.
s|Non-poetic written text, without intentional rhyme or meter; $x_2$ may be a convention rather than a subject.  See also {cfika}, {lisri}, {cukta}, {pemci}, {finti}.
$x_{1}$ is to the right/right-hand side of $x_{2}$ which faces/in-frame-of-reference $x_{3}$.
s|Also: $x_3$ is the standard of orientation for $x_2$.  See also cmavo list {ri'u}, {mlana}, {crane}, {trixe}, {farna}, {zunle}.
$x_{1}$ is a print/impression/image on/in surface $x_{2}$ of/made by/using tool/press/implement/object $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is wise/sage about matter $x_{2}$ (abstraction) to observer $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ (quoted text) is a question/query about subject $x_{2}$ by questioner $x_{3}$ to audience $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is a person/people (noun) [not necessarily human]; $x_{1}$ displays personality/a persona.
s|$x_{1}$ is a fish of species $x_{2}$ [metaphorical extension to sharks, non-fish aquatic vertebrates].

s|Also: $x_1$ is loving towards $x_2$, $x_1$ is a lover of $x_2$ (one sense), $x_2$ is beloved by $x_1$ (= {selpa'i} for reordered places).  See also {cinmo}, {xebni}, {nelci}, {djica}, {sinma}, {pluka}, {kurji}, {pendo}, {speni}.
$x_{1}$ is a profit/gain/benefit/advantage to $x_{2}$ accruing/resulting from activity/process $x_{3}$.

s|Also (fe) $x_2$ profits from $x_3$ (= {selterprali} for reordered places); $x_1$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {selposprali} for unambiguous semantics).  See also {vecnu}, {cnemu}, {pleji}, {jinga}, {canja}, {sfasa}, {jerna}, {jdima}, {dunda}, {zivle}.
$x_{1}$ invents/creates/composes/authors $x_{2}$ for function/purpose $x_{3}$ from existing elements/ideas $x_{4}$.
s|$x_1$ is creative/inventive.  See also cmavo list {fi'e}, {ciska}, {pemci}, {zbasu}, {larcu}, specific works of authorship, {prosa}, {skina}.
$x_{1}$ [ordered set] is sequenced/ordered/listed by comparison/rules $x_{2}$ on unordered set $x_{3}$.
s|Also (adjective:) $x_1$ is serial.  (sets are completely specified); See also cmavo list {po'i}, {lidne}, {liste}, {cmima}.
$x_{1}$ is a law specifying $x_{2}$ (state/event) for community $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$ by lawgiver(s) $x_{5}$.
s|$x_1$ is a legality; $x_2$ is legal/licit/legalized/a legality (= {selfla} for reordered places).  See also {javni}, {ritli}, {zekri}, {pulji}, {tinbe}.
$x_{1}$ is a current/flow/river of/in $x_{2}$ flowing in direction to/towards $x_{3}$ from direction/source $x_{4}$.

s|[$x_1$ is a stream of $x_2$; $x_2$ is a fluid Gas or liquid. (= {selfle} for reordered places); $x_1$ flushes toward $x_3$; flush (= {caifle}, {sukfle})]; See also {rirxe}, {senta} where no directionality is implied, {rinci}, {xampo}, {dikca}, {sakci}, {gapci}, {litki}, {ciblu}.
$x_{1}$ possesses/owns/has $x_{2}$ under law/custom $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is owner/proprietor of $x_{2}$ under $x_{3}$.

s|($x_3$ is generally more important to the concept than commonly accepted for the English equivalent, since the concept is broader when unconstrained, and the nature/interpretation of possession/ownership is very culturally dependent); See also {ckini}, {ralte}, {jitro}, {steci}, {srana}, {tutra}, {turni}, {zivle}.
$x_{1}$ reflects Polynesian/Oceanian (geographic region) culture/nationality/languages in aspect $x_{2}$.
s|For agentive folding (= {plogau}, {plozu'e}); use cardinal-value sumti in $x_3$, or rapli, to indicate multiple folds.  See also {korcu}, {cinje}, {boxfo}, {boxna}.
$x_{1}$ fails at doing $x_{2}$ (state/event); $x_{1}$ is a failure at its role in $x_{2}$.

s|Baffled (= {pesfli}, {jmifli}, {dafspufli}, {menfli}, among other senses); also $x_2$ ceases/does not complete/fails to continue due to failure on the part of $x_1$.  See also {cfila}, {snada}, {srera}, {troci}, {sisti}, {ranji}, {denpa}, {bebna}, {zunti}.
$x_{1}$ is a/the face [head/body-part] of $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is facial.
$x_{1}$ is a field [shape/form] of material $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is a broad uniform expanse of $x_{2}$.
s|Also woods (= {ricfoi}), lawn/meadow (= {sasfoi}), brush (= {spafoi}, {cicyspafoi}).  See also {purdi}, {cange}.
s|$x_{1}$ is a quantity of foam/froth/suds of material $x_{2}$, with bubbles/vacuoles of material $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a telephone transceiver/modem attached to system/network $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a route/path/way/course/track to $x_2$ from $x_3$ via/defined by points including $x_4$ (set).

s|A route merely connects origin/destination, but need not be improved in any way; ($x_4$ is a set of points at least sufficient to constrain the route relevantly).  (cf. {litru}, {naxle}, {tcana}, {dargu}, {klaji}, ve {klama}; {tadji}, {zukte} for means to a goal, {klama}, {pagre})
$x_{1}$ is a fork/fork-type tool/utensil for purpose $x_{2}$ with tines/prongs $x_{3}$ on base/support $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is complex/complicated/involved in aspect/property $x_{2}$ (ka) by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ (agent) plows/furrows/tills [cuts into and turns up] $x_{2}$ with tool $x_{3}$ propelled by $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is a plane [2-dimensional shape/form] defined by points $x_{2}$ (set); $x_{1}$ is flat/[smooth].
s|Also: $x_1$ is even/planar/level.  ($x_2$ is a set of points at least sufficient to define the plane); See also {xutla}, {sefta}, {tapla}, {karda}, {boxfo}, {pinta}.
$x_{1}$ (agent/object) leaps/jumps/springs/bounds to $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$ reaching height $x_{4}$ propelled by $x_{5}$.
s|Place structure parallels klama; hence $x_4$ may be a route-like expression.  See also {bajra}, {stapa}, {cpare}, {lafti}.
s|$x_{1}$ is a planet revolving around $x_{2}$ with planetary characteristics $x_{3}$, orbital parameters $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the pubic area/external genitalia [body-part] of $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ pays/compensates/remunerates/[rewards] payment $x_{2}$ to recipient/payee $x_{3}$ for goods/services $x_{4}$.

s|Also $x_4$ commodities; $x_4$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posle'i}, {posyvelyle'i} for unambiguous semantics); rent (= {jerle'i}, {lejyjbera}).  (cf. {canja}, {cnemu}, {friti}, {kargu}, {vecnu}, {jdima}, {prali}, {jerna}, {sfasa}, {dunda}, {jinga}, {dapma}; see note at jdima on cost/price/value distinction, {cirko}, {dirba})
s|Also invents/organizes; $x_2$ design, scheme; the structure or layout of an object would be represented as a state in $x_3$.  See also {cartu}.
s|$x_{1}$ is a picture/illustration representing/showing $x_{2}$, made by artist $x_{3}$ in medium $x_{4}$.

s|Also (adjective:) $x_1$ is pictorial/illustrative; drawing (= {xraselci'a}), $x_1$ draws $x_2$ (= xraci'a/xraci'a), image (= {xratai}), photo (= {kacmyxra}), take a photo (= {kacmyterxra}, {kacmyxragau}, {kacmyxrazu'e}); sculpture, relief (= {blixra}).  See also {ciska}, {cinta}, {prina}, {mupli}, {barna}, {skina}.
s|$x_{1}$ is a button/knob/[handle] on/for item $x_{2}$, with purpose $x_{3}$, made of material $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is a piano/harpsichord/synthesizer/organ; a keyboard musical instrument.
$x_{1}$ replaces/substitutes for/instead of $x_{2}$ in circumstance $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is a replacement/substitute.
$x_{1}$ is great/grand in property $x_{2}$ (ka) by standard $x_{3}$.

s|Indicates a subjective greatness, as compared to the objective standard implied for {barda}; (synonyms, possibly requiring tanru:) extraordinary, illustrious, magnificent, impressive, awesome, grandiose, august, inspiring, special, majestic, distinguished, eminent, splendor, stately, imposing (all generally {zabna}); terrible ({mabla}).  See also {barda}, {nobli}, {se} {sinma}, {pluja}, {misno}, {vajni}, {fasnu}, {cizra}, {traji}, {mutce}, {se} {manci}.
$x_{1}$ is flat/level/horizontal in gravity/frame of reference $x_{2}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is a pencil/crayon/stylus applying lead/marking material $x_{2}$, frame/support [of material] $x_{3}$.

s|Also writing brush; $x_1$ stimulates substrate medium $x_2$ to display marks; explicitly denoting a standard lead pencil (= {tabypinsi}).  (cf. {ciska}, {penbi} (unlike the English equivalents, pinsi is the more general term over penbi), {burcu}, {bakri})
$x_{1}$ (text) is a comment/remark/observation about subject $x_{2}$ expressed by $x_{3}$ to audience $x_{4}$.
s|Also: $x_3$ comments/remarks/says $x_1$ about $x_2$ (= terselpinka for reordered places).  See also {jinvi}, {cusku}, {zgana}, {lanli}, {bacru}, {ciska}.
$x_{1}$ is a/the clitoris/penis [projecting reproductive organ; body-part] of $x_{2}$.
s|Normally context eliminates need for specificity; otherwise: penis (= {nakpinji}), clitoris (= {fetpinji}).  See also {cinse}, {gletu}, {vibna}, {plibu}, {vlagi}, {mabla}, {ganti}.
s|$x_{1}$ is a prisoner/captive of $x_{2}$, restrained/held/confined by means/force $x_{3}$.
s|$x_2$ is scanty/meager/lacking for $x_1$.  See also {ricfu}, {claxu}, {nitcu}, {pikci}.
s|$x_{1}$ uses/employs $x_{2}$ [tool, apparatus, machine, agent, acting entity, material] for purpose $x_{3}$.

s|Also utilize; $x_2$ is useful/used productively by $x_1$ to do $x_3$ (= {selpli} for reordered places); hire/employ (= {le'ipli}, {lejyplicu'a}).  (cf. {tutci}, {cabra}, {minji}, {gasnu}, {zukte} for $x_2$, cmavo list {pi'o}, {sazri}, {jibri})
s|(cf. {grute}, {calku}, {skapi} (pilka as a general term includes skapi), {gacri})
$x_{1}$ is the product/total/result of factors/multiplicands ($x_{2}$ and $x_{3}$) $x_{2}$ multiplied by $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a ticket entitling $x_{2}$ to entitlement/privilege $x_{3}$ (event/state) under conditions $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is on the outside of $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is exterior to $x_{2}$.
s|Also importune, petition, plea, solicit; $x_2$ benefactor, patron; $x_3$ boon, favor, gift, alms. See also {cpedu} which is more general as to manner, {pindi}.
s|$x_{1}$ is a pin/peg (needle-shaped tool) for fastening to/piercing $x_{2}$, of material/properties $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$(s) is a/are mark(s)/spot(s) on $x_{2}$ of material $x_{3}$.
s|{ba'armo'a} for a pattern of marks.  See also {sinxa}, {pixra}, {se} {ciska}, {se} {prina}.
$x_{1}$ is a trillionth [$10^{-12}$] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$x_{1}$ is a tavern/bar/pub serving $x_{2}$ to audience/patrons $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ arches/curves over/around $x_{2}$ and is made of $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is an arch over/around $x_{2}$ of material $x_{3}$.
s|Also arc; $x_2$ need not be an object, but may be a point or volume.  See also {cripu}, {kruvi}, {korcu}, {condi}.
$x_{1}$ is a leaf of plant $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is foliage of $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ reacts/responds/answers with action $x_{2}$ to stimulus $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$; $x_{1}$ is responsive.

s|$x_3$ stimulates $x_1$ into reaction $x_2$, $x_3$ stimulates reaction $x_2$ (= {terfra} for place reordering); attempt to stimulate, prod (= {terfratoi}, {tunterfratoi}).  See also {preti}, {danfu}, {spuda}, {cpedu}, {tarti}.
$x_{1}$ is $10^{15}$ of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
s|$x_{1}$ is paste/pulp/dough/mash/mud/slurry [soft, smooth-textured, moist solid] of composition $x_{2}$.
s|$x_2$: composition including $x_2$, which need not be complete specification.  See also {marxa}, {kliti}, {tarla}.
$x_{1}$ is big/large in property/dimension(s) $x_{2}$ (ka) as compared with standard/norm $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ differs/is distinct from/contrasts with/is unlike $x_{2}$ in property/dimension/quantity $x_{3}$.
s|Also other-than (less common meaning).  See also {ranxi}, {drata}, {dunli}, {simsa}, {vrici}.

s|Also: $x_1$ is thoughtful (one sense); $x_2$ is mental (one sense)/intellectual (one sense) (= {selpei}).  See also cmavo list {pe'i}, {jijnu}, {menli}, {morji}, {sidbo}, {jinvi}, se {nabmi}, {minra}, {lanli}, {besna}, {saske}, {skami}.
$x_{1}$ [force] (ka) forces/compels event $x_{2}$ to occur; $x_{1}$ determines property $x_{2}$ to manifest.

s|Also constrains; requires success, unlike the physics term (better expressed by {danre}).  See also {fanta}, {rinju}, {jimte}, {jitro}, {rinka}, {krinu}, {zukte}, {randa}, {danre}, cmavo list {bai}, {marxa}, {tinsa}, {xarnu}.
$x_{1}$ is/acts as a friend of/to $x_{2}$ (experiencer); $x_{2}$ befriends $x_{1}$.
$x_{1}$ (agent) touches $x_{2}$ with $x_{3}$ [a locus on $x_{1}$ or an instrument] at $x_{4}$ [a locus on $x_{2}$].
$x_{1}$ is a pen using ink $x_{2}$ applied by process $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a poem/verse about plot/theme/subject/pattern $x_{2}$ by author $x_{3}$ for intended audience $x_{4}$.
s|$x_2$ may be a convention rather than a subject.  See also {prosa}, {rimni}, {rilti}, {finti}, {lisri}, {sanga}.
s|Sheet of paper (= {plekarda} if shape is important, {plebo'o}).  See also {karni}, {papri}, {prina}.
$x_{1}$ (action) is easy/simple/facile for $x_{2}$ (agent) under conditions $x_{3}$; $x_{2}$ does $x_{1}$ freely/easily.
s|$x_{1}$ is a fraction, with numerator $x_{2}$, denominator $x_{3}$ ($x_{2}$/$x_{3}$).

s|($x_4$ may be nu canja, nu pleji, etc.; an unconditional offering has the 'condition' of acceptance); $x_2$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posfriti}, {posyselfriti} for unambiguous semantics).  See also {canja}, {dunda}, {rinsa}, {vecnu}, {jdima}, {cnemu}, {pleji}, {vitke}.
s|$x_1$ frowns/grimaces at/in reaction to $x_2$ (= {frufra}).  See also {cmila}, {cisma}.
$x_{1}$ is a copy/replica/duplicate/clone of $x_{2}$ in form/medium $x_{3}$ made by method $x_{4}$ (event).
$x_{1}$ (event/property) is determined by the luck/fortune of $x_{2}$; (note mabla/zabna not implied). $x_{1}$ is determined by chance.
$x_{1}$ rots/decays/ferments with decay/fermentation agent $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is rotten/decayed/fermented.
s|$x_{1}$ is a pot/kettle/urn/tub/sink, a deep container for contents $x_{2}$, of material/properties $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a potato [an edible tuber] of variety/cultivar $x_{2}$.
s|(use samcu for starchy/tuberous roots that do not reproduce from eyes of tuber); See also {genja}, {jalna}, {samcu}.
$x_{1}$ is a father of $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ begets/sires/acts paternal towards $x_{2}$; [not necessarily biological].
$x_{1}$ is a robe/tunic/gown/cloak/dress/[coveralls] [a long/full body garment] of material $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is responsible/accountable for $x_{2}$ (action/resulting state) to judge/authority $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is an article/descriptor labelling description $x_{2}$ (text) in language $x_{3}$ with semantics $x_{4}$.

s|$x_2$ is the noun phrase/sumti without the article/descriptor; description (($x_1$ with $x_2$) = gadysu'i); note: 'determiner' has become the accepted general linguistics term, displacing 'article'; however, 'determiner' includes all words that can introduce a noun phrase/sumti, whether a description or not, such as pronoun possessives like lemi, quantifiers (especially in indefinites) like ci and su'o, and demonstratives like ti, ta, and tu; the term 'descriptor' in Lojban, is limited to words that introduce descriptions (excluding indefinites), such as those of selma'o LA and LE, their common compounds such as lemi, and possibly lenu.  'article' typically refers only to a single word; Lojban assumes the broader meaning] See also {valsi}, {cmavo}.
s|$x_{1}$ (me'o, fraction) is a ratio/rate of $x_{2}$ (quantity) with respect to $x_{3}$ (quantity), [$x_{2}$:$x_{3}$].
s|Also $x_1$ fraction/proportion/quotient; $x_2$ dividend/numerator; $x_3$ divisor/denominator.  See also {frinu}, {dilcu}, {mekso}.
$x_{1}$ is a [physical] page/leaf of book/document/bound mass of pages $x_{2}$.

s|Numbered pages (as in a book) are the sides of a page (= {paprysfe}, {paprysfelai}); a pageful of text (= {papryseltcidu}, {paprytcidylai}).  See also {karni}, {pelji}, {prina}, {xatra}, {vreji}, {pezli}, {cukta}, {ciska}.

s|Causal, resultative change; agentive modification (= {gafygau}, {gafyzu'e}).  (cf. {stika} for non-resultative, {binxo} for not-necessarily causal change, {cenba} for non-resultative change; {zasni})
$x_{1}$ is a [biological] offspring/child/kid/hybrid of parent(s) $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is filial.
$x_{1}$ protests/objects to/complains about $x_{2}$ (event/state) to audience $x_{3}$ with action $x_{4}$.
($x_4$ is an event or {tu'a} quotation) See also {xarnu}.
$x_{1}$ parallels $x_{2}$ differing only in property $x_{3}$ (ka; jo'u/fa'u term) by standard/geometry $x_{4}$.

s|Also: $x_1$ is parallel to $x_2$, $x_3$ is the only difference between $x_1$ and $x_2$ (= {terpanra} for reordered places); $x_1$ and $x_2$ are alike/similar/congruent.   A parallel involves extreme close similarity/correspondence across the entirety of the things being compared, generally involving multiple properties, with focus placed on one or a small number of differences. See also {pa'a}, {mintu}, {simsa}, {girzu}, {vrici}.
s|(cf. {jamna}; use {sarxe}, {smaji}, {tugni} for most metaphorical extensions, {cilce}, {jamna})
$x_{1}$ is a slice [thin flat portion] of $x_{2}$ (mass).
$x_{1}$ is a park/land reserve managed by community/polity/company $x_{2}$ for purpose $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of sponge/porous material.
s|Also metaphorically used for coral, Swiss cheese.  See also {cokcu} for a generalized absorbant.
$x_{1}$ (agent) punctuates $x_{2}$ (expression) with symbol/word $x_{3}$ with syntactic/semantic effect $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is an odor/fragrance/scent/smell emitted by $x_{2}$ and detected by observer/sensor $x_{3}$.
s|An undetected emitter is odorless to the observer.  See also {nazbi}, {sumne}, {cpina}, {vrusi}.
$x_{1}$ is high/up/upward in frame of reference $x_{2}$ as compared with baseline/standard height $x_{3}$.
s|Also upper; $x_3$ is generally some defined distance above a zero point/baseline, or is that baseline itself.  See also {gapru}, {dizlo}, {cnita}, {drudi}, {farna}.
$x_{1}$ is a pump/injector [tool/apparatus] pumping/inserting fluid $x_{2}$ to $x_{3}$ from $x_{4}$ by means $x_{5}$.

s|$x_2$ fluid may be liquid or gas; $x_5$ may be a force; a pump generally causes a pressure gradient, such that $x_3$ is a place of lower pressure, $x_4$ a place of higher pressure.  (cf. {gapci}, {litki}, {rinci}; metaphorical use of {fepri} for gas, {risna} for liquid, {rinci}, {tutci})
$x_{1}$ is a plate/dish/platter/saucer [flat/mildly concave food service bed] made of material $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the throat/gullet [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: narrow(ing) opening of a deep hole].
s|$x_{1}$ is a tray/platter/flat container [pan/sheet/griddle] of contents $x_{2}$, and made of material $x_{3}$.
s|Also pallet, when used for carrying rather than support on the ground; a tray is flat-bottomed and shallow or without a rim, and is generally portable.  See also {tansi}, {patxu}, {palta}, {ckana}.
s|$x_{1}$ (portal/passage/entrance-way) is closed/shut/not open, preventing passage/access to $x_{2}$ by $x_{3}$ (something being blocked).
s|As a doorway, but also perhaps a semi-permeable membrane. $x_{3}$ is blocked by $x_{1}$. $x_{2}$ is inaccessible. See also {kalri}, {pagre}, {canko}, {vorme}, {zunti}.

s|$x_2$ includes jei = rule ({jetpai}), ni = estimate ({lairpai}), ka = evaluate ({kairpai} or {vampai}), or nu = referee/arbitrate ({faurpai}); single events of judging including specific decisions/judgements (= {paijdi}, {jetpaijdi}, {lairpaijdi}, {kairpaijdi}, {vampaijdi}, {faurpaijdi}); jury (= {pairkamni}), serve on a jury (= {kamnypai}, as part of mass $x_1$).  See also {cuxna}, {jdice}, {vajni}, {cipra}, {zekri}, {manri}, {mansa}.
$x_{1}$ is broad/wide in dimension $x_{2}$ [2nd most significant dimension] by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ [observer] senses/detects/notices stimulus $x_{2}$ (object/nu) by means $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$.

s|$x_1$ is sensitive to $x_2$; also feels, spots, perceives, makes out, discerns/recognizes (but only implying reaction without necessarily any significant mental processing); note that the emphasis is on a property which stimulates $x_1$ and is detected (sanji is passive about the sensing, and is not limited to sensory input, as well as presuming some kind of discernment/recognition, while not being concerned with the means of detection); $x_3$ sense/sensory channel.  See also {pencu}, {sanji}, {viska}, {sumne}, {tirna}, {zgana}, {canci}, {simlu}.
$x_{1}$ passes through/penetrates barrier/medium/portal $x_{2}$ to destination side $x_{3}$ from origin side $x_{4}$.
s|Passing through in both directions (= rolfargre, pagre ... .i so'ivo'ivo'u (and vice versa)).  See also {bitmu}, {denci}, {ganlo}, {kalri}, {vorme}, {pluta}, {canko}, {ragve}.
$x_{1}$ is a part/component/piece/portion/segment of $x_{2}$ [where $x_{2}$ is a whole/mass]; $x_{2}$ is partly $x_{1}$.
s|$x_{1}$ hopes/wishes for/desires $x_{2}$ (event), expected likelihood $x_{3}$ (0-1); $x_{1}$ hopes that $x_{2}$ happens.

s|Also: $x_1$ is hopeful of $x_2$; $x_2$ will hopefully occur, as hoped for by $x_1$; the value of $x_3$ is a subjective estimate of likeliness according to $x_1$, and is the basic determinant of whether pacna means 'hope' or 'wish' or 'expect': hoping for objects/states with negligible expectation is "wishing"; if the state is plausibly likely, it is "hoping"; when the probability is subjectively near 1, the attitude is described as "expecting"; the value will usually be expressed using inexact numbers ("{li} {piso'u}" to "{li} {piro}"); wish (= {sotpa'a}), hope (= {sorpa'a}), expect (= {sojypa'a}).  See also {djica}.
s|$x_{1}$ is a/the anus/anal orifice/asshole/arsehole [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: exit, waste exit].
s|Also asshole/ass/arsehole; (adjective:) $x_1$ is anal.  See also {zargu}, {kalci}, {mabla}, {rinci}.
$x_{1}$ organizes $x_{2}$ [relative chaos] into $x_{3}$ [ordered/organized result] by system/principle(s) $x_{4}$.
s|$x_3$ is also a system; $x_4$ could be merely a function which inherently serves to dictate the organizational structure of $x_3$.  See also {ciste}, {morna}, {stura}, {bilni}, {cabra}.
s|$x_{1}$ is gaseous/fumes/a gas/vapor of material/composition including $x_{2}$, under conditions $x_{3}$.
s|$x_3$ includes temperature and pressure.  See also {pambe}, {vacri}, {litki}, {sligu}, {danmo}, {bumru}, {cidro}, {flecu}.
$x_{1}$ is directly/vertically above/upwards-from $x_{2}$ in gravity/frame of reference $x_{3}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is a rail/railing/bar [tool] supporting/restraining $x_{2}$, of material $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ [person/agent] is an agentive cause of event $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ does/brings about $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/is made of/contains steel of composition including $x_{2}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is a root [body-part] of plant/species $x_{2}$; [metaphor: immobile, supporting, nourishing].
s|$x_{1}$ (du'u) is news/tidings/new information about subject $x_{2}$ from source $x_{3}$, to observer $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is the grammar/rules/defining form of language $x_{2}$ for structure/text $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is neutral/not taking sides/medial/not towards any extreme on scale/in dissension $x_{2}$.

s|Also $x_2$ dispute/struggle (though $x_2$ is not limited to disagreements, which is merely one manifestation of scalar or distributed values in which there is a medial position).  See also {midju}, {lanxe}, {milxe}, {mutce}, cmavo list {no'e}.
$x_{1}$ (object) suffices/is enough/sufficient for purpose $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$.

s|A guiding person advises/suggests/sets an example to be followed, but does not necessarily control/direct/manage actual execution of an event; an event may serve as a guide by setting a pattern/example to be emulated.  See also {jitro}, {ralju}, {sazri}, te {bende}, {jatna}, {fukpi}, {morna}.
$x_{1}$ is a rural/rustic/pastoral area of $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is in the country.
$x_{1}$ is a billion [British milliard] [$10^9$] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$x_{1}$ is a camp/encampment/temporary residence of $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is group/cluster/team showing common property (ka) $x_{2}$ due to set $x_{3}$ linked by relations $x_{4}$.

s|Also collection, team, comprised of, comprising; members $x_3$ (a specification of the complete membership) comprise group $x_1$; cluster (= {kangri}).  See also {bende}, {ciste}, {cmima}, {gunma}, {panra}, {cabra}, {cecmu}, {kansa}, {klesi}, {lanzu}, {liste}, {vrici}.
s|$x_{1}$ is a (Lojban) root word expressing relation $x_{2}$ among argument roles $x_{3}$, with affix(es) $x_{4}$.

s|Gismu list, if physical object (= ({loi}) {gimste}); referring to the mental construct (e.g. propose adding a new gismu to the gismu list = {gimpoi}, {gimselcmi}, {gimselste}).  See also {cmavo}, {cmene}, {lujvo}, {smuni}, {sumti}, {tanru}, {valsi}.

s|$x_1$ and $x_2$ are symmetrical; mounts (= {cpanygle}). Note that the word "gletu" lacks the taboo associated with some of its English gloss words, or any of the various English slang uses. See also {cinse}, {pinji}, {plibu}, {vibna}, {vlagi}, {mabla}, {speni}.
$x_{1}$ is English/pertains to English-speaking culture in aspect $x_{2}$.

s|Generally assume broadest sense of 'English'; may refer to 'English', pertaining to the country/people/culture of England (normally requiring constraint = gligu'e, or simply redundancy = gligli-); British English, the norm language of the UK (= {gliglibau}).  (cf. {brito} which refers to the United Kingdom as a whole or to the British empire, {merko}, {sralo}, {kadno}, {skoto})
$x_{1}$ is a mitten/glove [hand and lower arm garment] of material $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a message/notice/memorandum about subject $x_{2}$ from author $x_{3}$ to intended audience $x_{4}$.

s|Emphasis on brevity, single or identifiable subject (contrast with xatra: the emphasis in notci is on the single or cohesively focused subject, while the audience is less defined - indeed only an 'intended' audience.  xatra need not have a single or focussed subject - its corresponding place is for 'content'); reminder/memo/note (= {mojnoi}).  See also {xatra}, {nuzba}, {mrilu}, {morji}.
$x_{1}$ is $10^{-24}$ of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$x_{1}$ is $10^{24}$ of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$x_{1}$ [magnitude] is a unit/degree of/on scale/reference standard $x_{2}$ (si'o) measuring property $x_{3}$.
s|Also grade, level, point; $x_3$ dimension.  See also {ckilu}, {kantu}, {kelvo}, {merli}, {ranti}, {selci}.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ gram(s) [metric unit] in mass (default is 1) by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/is made of/contains grease/fat/oil from source $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a frame/structure/skeleton/outline supporting/load-bearing/determining the form of $x_{2}$.

s|Also upper-class; high/low, upper/lower are poor Lojban metaphors; note $x_2$ standard applies when the title/nobility is not recognized culture/society wide; this would include self-assumed titles.  See also {banli}.
$x_{1}$ is a girl [young female person] of age $x_{2}$ immature by standard $x_{3}$.
s|Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use verba).  See also {nanla}, {verba}, {ninmu}.
$x_{1}$ is public/un-hidden/open/jointly available to/owned by all among community $x_{2}$ (mass).
$x_{1}$ needs/requires/is dependent on/[wants] necessity $x_{2}$ for purpose/action/stage of process $x_{3}$.
s|No implication of lack.  See also {banzu}, {cidja}, {claxu}, {pindi}, {xebni}, {sarcu}, {lacri}, {djica}, {taske}, {xagji}.
$x_{1}$ is a nerve/neuron [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: information/control network connection].
Also (adjective:) $x_1$ is neural.  See also ve {benji}.
$x_{1}$ is the country of peoples $x_{2}$ with land/territory $x_{3}$; (people/territory relationship).
s|Also sovereignty, domestic (as opposed to foreign), nation (when not referring to ethnos).  See also {turni}, {natmi}, {jecta}, {tumla}, {tutra}, {lanci}.
$x_{1}$ is a woman/women; $x_{1}$ is a female humanoid person [not necessarily adult].
s|Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use remna or prenu).  See also {nanmu}, {remna}, {prenu}, {makcu}, {nixli}.
s|$x_{1}$ is a quantity of citrus [fruit/tree, etc.] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of nickel/other metal resistant to oxidation.
$x_{1}$ is industry/industrial/systematic manufacturing activity producing $x_{2}$ by process/means $x_{3}$.
s|Also: $x_1$ is a worker/laborer.  (cf. {sazri}, {gasnu}, {se} {jibri}; {zukte} - which need not be labor; physics term 'work' = {ni} {muvyselbai}, {briju}, {jibri}, {lazni}, {selfu})
$x_{1}$ is a nighttime of day $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is at night/nocturnal.
s|Tonight (= {cabycte}); tomorrow night (= {bavlamcte}, even when tonight is still in the future); last night (= {prulamcte}).  See also {donri}, {djedi}, {tcika}.
s|$x_{1}$ is a mass/team/aggregate/whole, together composed of components $x_{2}$, considered jointly.

s|A description in $x_1$ indicates of mass property(ies) displayed by the mass; masses may reveal properties not found in the individual set members that are massified, which themselves are not necessarily relevant to the mass property implicit in this bridi.  See also {bende}, {girzu}, {pagbu}, cmavo list {loi}, {lei}, {lai}, {ciste}, {cmima}, {kansa}, {tinci}, {mulgunma}.
$x_{1}$ logically necessitates/entails/implies action/event/state $x_{2}$ under rules/logic system $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ rolls/trundles on/against surface $x_{2}$ rotating on axis/axle $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is a roller.
$x_{1}$ (person/mass) attacks/invades/commits aggression upon victim $x_{2}$ with goal/objective $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is in/inside/within $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is on the inside/interior of $x_{2}$ [totally within the bounds of $x_{2}$].
s|Indicates total containment.  (cf. se {vasru} (for containment that need not be total), {jbini}, {zvati}, {cpana}, {sruri}, {senta}, {snuji}, {bartu}, {diklo}, {jibni}, {jinru}, {setca})
$x_{1}$ is fond of/likes/has a taste for $x_{2}$ (object/state).
$x_{1}$ is energy of type $x_{2}$ in form $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ [energy] is light/illumination illuminating $x_2$ from light source $x_3$.

s|[$x_3$ illuminates/lights $x_2$ with light/illumination $x_1$; $x_2$ is lit/illuminated by illumination $x_1$ from source $x_3$ (= {selgu'i} for reordered places); light/lamp (= {tergu'i})](cf. {dirce}, {manku}, {solri}, {carmi}, {ctino}, {kantu})
$x_{1}$ is a restaurant/cafe/diner serving type-of-food $x_{2}$ to audience $x_{3}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ (default 1) short local distance unit(s) [non-metric], standard $x_{3}$, $x_{4}$ subunits.

s|Foot (= {jmagutci}); yard (= {cibjmagutci}), pace (= {tapygutci}), inch (= {degygutci}), cubit (= {birgutci}).  (additional subunit places may be added as $x_5$, $x_6$, ...); See also {mitre}, {clani}, {ganra}, {condi}, {rotsu}, {rupnu}, {fepni}, {dekpu}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}, {kramu}.
s|$x_{1}$ is a/the womb/uterus [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: nourishing, protective, giving birth].
$x_{1}$ is the nose [body-part] of $x_{2}$ with nostril(s)/nasal passage(s) $x_{3}$; [metaphor: protrusion].
$x_{1}$ is a canal/channel to $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$ with route $x_{4}$.
s|$x_2$/$x_3$ may be unordered.  See also {pluta}, {rirxe}, {klaji}, {dargu}.
$x_1$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of noble gas of type $x_2$ [helium/neon/argon/krypton/xenon/radon].
$x_{1}$ brakes/causes to slow motion/activity $x_{2}$ with device/mechanism/principle $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a nation/ethnic group of peoples $x_{2}$; [people sharing a history/culture].
s|Also exception (= {nafmupli}); agentive contradict/deny (= {nafxu'a} or {tolxu'a}).  See also {nibli}, {tugni}, {zanru}, {xusra}.
$x_{1}$ is a nut [body-part: hard-shelled fruit] from plant/species $x_{2}$ with shell $x_{3}$ and kernel $x_{4}$.
s|Also $x_4$ nucleus, center (= {velnarge} for place reordering).  See also {grute}, {stagi}, {jbari}, {midju}.
$x_{1}$ (object) adorns/decorates $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is an adornment/decoration of $x_{2}$; $x_{2}$ is fancy/decorated.
$x_{1}$ is a billionth/thousand-millionth [$10^{-9}$] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$x_{1}$ is a man/men; $x_{1}$ is a male humanoid person [not necessarily adult].
s|Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use remna or prenu).  See also {ninmu}, {remna}, {prenu}, {makcu}, {nanla}, {bersa}.
$x_{1}$ is a boy/lad [young male person] of age $x_{2}$ immature by standard $x_{3}$.
s|Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use verba).  See also {nixli}, {verba}, {nanmu}, {bersa}.
$x_{1}$ is difficult/hard/challenging for $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ challenges (non-agentive) $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ years in duration (default is 1 year) by standard $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is annual.
s|This year (= {cabna'a}); next year (= {bavlamna'a}); last year (= {prulamna'a}).  See also {detri}, {djedi}, {jeftu}, {masti}.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains bread [leavened or unleavened] made from grains $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ (li) is a number/quantifier/digit/value/figure (noun); refers to the value and not the symbol.
$x_{1}$ is a rocket [vehicle] propelled by jet expelling $x_{2}$ carrying payload $x_{3}$.

s|Also: $x_2$ gives rise to $x_1$ (= selja'e for reordered places); total (general meaning, but also = mekyja'e, pi'irja'e, sujyja'e).  See also se {mukti}, te {zukte}, se {rinka}, se {krinu}, se {nibli}, {mulno}, {sumji}, {pilji}, {mekso}, cmavo list {ja'e}, {ciksi}.
$x_{1}$ is a/the wing [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: lateral supporting surface].
$x_1$ is a male/buck of species $x_2$ evidencing masculine physical/biological/genetic trait(s) $x_3$ (ka); $x_1$ is masculine.
s|See also {fetsi}, {bersa}. For culturally male traits, see {jikynakni}.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of starch from source $x_{2}$ of composition including $x_{3}$.

s|Also grasshopper (= {pipyjalra});  cricket (= {sagjalra}); locust, termite (= {mantyjalra} or {mudyctijalra}).  (Orthoptera includes grasshoppers, crickets, etc; termites are a closely-related non-Orthoptera, more akin to cockroaches than to e.g. ants); See also {cinki}, {civla}, {manti}.
$x_{1}$ is a/the foot [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: lowest portion] (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is pedal.
$x_{1}$ (event/state) is a problem to/encountered by $x_{2}$ in situation/task/inquiry $x_{3}$.
s|Also: $x_1$ requires consideration by $x_2$.  See also {preti}, {danfu}, {ciksi}, {jijnu}, {jinvi}, {nandu}, {pensi}, {sidbo}, {spuda}, {raktu}.
$x_{1}$ (person/mass) wars against $x_{2}$ over territory/matter $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is at war with $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a bell/chime/[tuning fork] [tuned percussion instrument] producing sound/note $x_{2}$.
s|Also: $x_1$ rings/tolls (i.e. if it rings, then it is a bell); resonates (one sense, = {jabdesku}).  See also {zgike}, {tonga}, {desku}, {slilu}.
$x_{1}$ is a/the shoulder/hip/joint [body-part] attaching limb/extremity $x_{2}$ to body $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a museum for preserving [and possibly exhibiting] $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ (object) moves to destination/receiver $x_{2}$ [away] from origin $x_{3}$ over path/route $x_{4}$.

s|Also mobile (= {comymu'u}, for the non-specific opposite of immobile); after a muvdu, object is alienated from/no longer at origin (unless physically returned there, per litru or slilu); agentive move (= {muvgau}, {muvzu'e}), non-agentive transitive move (= {muvri'a}), self-propelled (= {sezmuvgau}), motion of a part of the object (= {pagmu'u}), having a moving part (= {muvypau}, {muvyselpau}); apparent motion (= {mlumu'u}).  (cf. {rinci}, {klama} (which differs in that the means of motion is explicit), {litru}, {cliva}, {fatri}; {dunda}, {benji} for agentive movement that does not necessarily imply alienation from origin, preja for similar movement with no agent implied, {bevri}, {vimcu})
(also collide = {simjanli} for a collision between two moving objects); See also {darxi}.
s|$x_{1}$ is much/extreme in property $x_{2}$ (ka), towards $x_{3}$ extreme/direction; $x_{1}$ is, in $x_{2}$, very $x_{3}$.
s|Also very, a lot, immoderate/immoderately, pretty, intense, quite, extremely.  See also {milxe}, {traji}, {banli}, {carmi}, {nutli}.
$x_{1}$ pertains to the Islamic/Moslem/Koranic [Quranic] culture/religion/nation in aspect $x_{2}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is a curtain/blinds/drapes for covering/obscuring aperture $x_{2}$, and made of material $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is the [astronomical] twilight/dawn/dusk/half-light/glimmering of day $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
s|Morning twilight, dawn (= {cermurse}); evening twilight, dusk (= {vacmurse}).  See also {cerni}, {kandi}, {vanci}.
$x_{1}$ is an example/sample/specimen/instance/case/illustration of common property(s) $x_{2}$ of set $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a diplomat/consul representing polity $x_{2}$ in/at negotiation $x_{3}$ for function/purpose $x_{4}$.
s|(for) $x_3$ polity, (use tu'a); also ambassador (= {raljansu}, {trujansu}).  See also {jecta}, {krati}.
$x_{1}$ is a universe/cosmos [complete and ordered entirety] of domain/sphere $x_{2}$ defined by rules $x_{3}$.

s|Also world; a universe is a kind of system, one which comprehensively encompasses its domain; e.g. 'universe of discourse', or 'world of birds'; $x_3$ are the rules/defining principles which distinguish the universe from other universes, or from non-universe.  See also {ciste}, {plini}, {kensa}, {mulno}.
$x_{1}$ (event) is complete/done/finished; $x_{1}$ (object) has become whole in property $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$.

s|Also perfected, entirety; (adverb/adjective:) entire, total, integral, fully, totally, wholly, completely, entirely.  See also {fanmo}, {culno}, {pagbu}, {xadba}, {prane}, {jalge}, {sumji}, {munje}, {sisti}, {xadni}.
s|$x_{1}$ (action/event/state) motivates/is a motive/incentive for action/event $x_{2}$, per volition of $x_{3}$.

s|Also; $x_3$ is motivated to bring about result/goal/objective $x_2$ by $x_1$ (= {termu'i} for reordered places); (note that 'under conditions' BAI may apply and be appropriately added to the main predicate level or within the $x_2$ action level).  (cf. cmavo list {mu'i}, {nibli}, te {zukte} - generally better for 'goal', se {jalge}, {krinu}, {rinka}, {ciksi}, {djica}, {xlura})
s|$x_{1}$ is an account/bill/invoice for goods/services $x_{2}$, billed to $x_{3}$ by $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is a suburban area of city/metropolis $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/is made of/contains wood/lumber from tree(s) of type/species $x_{2}$.

s|[reveal (= {tolmipygau}, {mipyja'o}, {sivja'o}); also: $x_1$ shows that $x_2$, $x_1$ shows off $x_2$; Use {arco} for displaying objects.; See also {tigni}, {cipra}, {zgana}, {jvinu}, {lanli}, {mipri}, {simlu}.
$x_{1}$ is narrow in dimension $x_{2}$ [2nd most significant dimension] by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ [tool] is a hammer for/hammers $x_{2}$ [target] consisting of weight/head $x_{3}$ propelled by $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ mails/posts [transfer via intermediary service] $x_{2}$ to recipient address $x_{3}$ from mailbox/post office/sender address $x_{4}$ by carrier/network/system $x_{5}$.
s|Also $x_4$ post office, mailbox.  (cf. {benji} [in which the medium need not be a 3rd party service/system, and $x_2$ need not consist of discrete units], {notci}, {xatra}, {tcana})
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of rye [grain] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a passport issued to $x_{2}$ (person) by authority $x_{3}$ allowing $x_{4}$ (activity).
$x_{1}$ is friction [force opposing motion] due to contact/rubbing between $x_{2}$ and $x_{3}$; (fe) $x_{2}$ rubs $x_{3}$.
s|Also $x_2$ scrubs/wipes/brushes (against) $x_3$ (= {seltermosra}); non-agentive rub (= {termosra}).  See also {sakli}, {sraku}, {jabre}, {satre}, {guska}, {pencu}, {spali}.
$x_{1}$ is dead/has ceased to be alive.
$x_{1}$ is/reflects/represents a pattern of forms/events $x_{2}$ arranged according to structure $x_{3}$.

s|[$x_3$ is a model for $x_1$ (= {termontai}, or the more abstract = {termonsi'o}); image (= {gusmo'a}, {nenmo'a}, {dairmo'a}, {selylenmo'a}, {selmirmo'a}, {velmirmo'a}, but also all of these -tai instead of -mo'a for the ideal)]; See also {ciste}, {ganzu}, {marji}, {slilu}, {stura}, {tarmi}, {boxna}, {cimde}, {gidva}, {jimpe}, {rilti}.
$x_{1}$ is a rule prescribing/mandating/requiring $x_{2}$ (event/state) within system/community $x_{3}$.

s|Regulation, prescription (also $x_2$), principle, requirement (also $x_2$), prescribe, require (conditions are usually contained within $x_2$); $x_1$ is regulatory; $x_2$, $x_3$ are regulated.  See also {flalu}, {ritli}, cmavo list {ja'i}, {marde}, {tcaci}, {tinbe}, {zekri}.
$x_{1}$ is a bomb/explosive device with explosive material/principle $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ mole(s) [metric unit] in substance (default is 1) by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a mill/foundry/industrial plant/[assembly line] performing process $x_{2}$.
s|(unlike fanri,) need not produce a product; grain mill (= {grumlo}), grinding mill (= {zalmlo}, {zalmlotci}, {zalmloca'a}).  See also {gasta}, {gurni}, {tirse}, {fanri}, {zalvi}.
$x_{1}$ is a/the mouth/oral cavity [body-part] of $x_{2}$; (metaphor: entrance/intake for consumption).
$x_{1}$ is a point/instant/moment [0-dimensional shape/form] in/on/at time/place $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is born to $x_{2}$ at time $x_{3}$ [birthday] and place $x_{4}$ [birthplace]; $x_{1}$ is native to (fo) $x_{4}$.
s|$x_2$ bears/gives birth to $x_1$; also $x_3$: natal day.  See also {fange}, {gutra}, {rorci}, {mamta}, {salci}, {citsi}.
$x_{1}$ (agent) borrows/temporarily takes/assumes $x_{2}$ (object) from source $x_{3}$ for interval $x_{4}$.
s|Credit (= {jernu'e}); borrow/assume a property or quality as a chameleon does (= {zaskai}, {zasysmitra}, {zasysmitai}).  See also {dejni}, {janta}, {zivle}.
$x_{1}$ is between/among set of points/bounds/limits $x_{2}$ (set)/amidst mass $x_{2}$ in property $x_{3}$ (ka).

s|$x_2$ (a complete set, generally ordered) defines the bounds/limits/range for $x_1$.  See also se {vasru}, {nenri}, {zvati}, {cpana}, {snuji}, {senta}, {bitmu}, {jimte}, {kuspe}, {jibni}, {lamji}, {sruri}, {vanbi}, {midju}, {cmima}, {setca}.
$x_{1}$ is firm/hard/resistant/unyielding to force $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ (experiencer) decreases/contracts/is reduced/diminished in property/quantity $x_{2}$ by amount $x_{3}$.
s|$x_{1}$ is a satellite/moon orbiting $x_{2}$ with characteristics $x_{3}$, orbital parameters $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is a mold/fungus/mushrooms/truffles of species/strain $x_{2}$ parasitic/growing on $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is less than $x_{2}$ in property/quantity $x_{3}$ (ka/ni) by amount $x_{4}$.
s|Also negative (= {nonme'a}).  See also cmavo list {me'a}, cmavo list {su'o}, {jdika}, {zmadu}, {traji}.
$x_{1}$ is a cat/[puss/pussy/kitten] [feline animal] of species/breed $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is feline.
$x_{1}$ is to the side of/lateral to $x_{2}$ and facing $x_{3}$ from point of view/in-frame-of-reference $x_{4}$.

s|(cf. {crane}, {trixe}, {pritu}, {zunle} which differ in that the direction of facing is the front and not the lateral side.  The $x_4$ of mlana may be either the front, or back side of $x_2$, {korbi})
$x_{1}$ (mass) is a mixture/blend/colloid/commingling with ingredients including $x_{2}$.
s|$x_2$ mingles/mixes/blends into $x_1$; $x_2$ is in $x_1$, an ingredient/part/component/element of $x_1$ (= {selxre} for reordered places).  See also {salta}, te {runta}, {stasu}, {jicla}, {sanso}.
$x_{1}$ [amount] is the price of $x_{2}$ to purchaser/consumer $x_{3}$ set by vendor $x_{4}$.

s|$x_2$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posydi'a}, {posyseldi'a} for unambiguous semantics); price is something decided/set by the seller, and is closely akin to offer ({friti}), which is what a buyer may decide; (note that price is not he same as cost/expense, which is the actual amount exchanged in a transaction; the latter is {vecnu} or {canja}; neither is the same as "value" or {vamji}; in colloquial English, these are sometimes interchanged, at least partially because of the rarity of barter and bargaining in the marketplace).  See also {canja}, {friti}, {janta}, {jdini}, {kargu}, {pleji}, {dapma}, {vamji} for 'value', ve {vecnu} for 'cost', {canja}, {fepni}, {jerna}, {jinga}, {prali}, {rupnu}, {sfasa}, {vamji}.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ meter(s) [metric unit] in length (default 1) measured in direction $x_{3}$ by standard $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ (person/object/event) is famous/renowned/is a celebrity among community of persons $x_{2}$ (mass).
s|Also celebrated/well-known; (derogative meanings:) notorious/infamous (= {malmi'o}; these could also be expressed using the referenced words).  See also se {sinma}, {banli}.
$x_{1}$ keeps $x_{2}$ secret/hidden from $x_{3}$ by method $x_{4}$; $x_{2}$ is a secret; $x_{1}$ hides/conceals $x_{2}$.
s|Intransitive hidden/secret, without an agent (= {selcri} or {nalterju'o}); secret (= {selmipri}).  See also {stace}, {mifra}, {sivni}, {djuno}, {cirko}, {jarco}.
$x_{1}$ is money/currency issued by $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is financial/monetary/pecuniary/fiscal.
s|'currency' sometimes is restricted to paper money (= {pledi'i}).  See also {fepni}, {jdima}, {rupnu}, {sicni}, {canja}.
$x_{1}$ is the same/identical thing as $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$; ($x_{1}$ and $x_{2}$ interchangeable).
s|(cf. {panra}, {satci}, {mapti}, {simsa}, {drata}, {dunli}, cmavo list {du} - which has no standard place, {simxu})
$x_{1}$ reflects/mirrors/echoes $x_{2}$ [object/radiation] to observer/point $x_{3}$ as $x_{4}$; $x_{2}$ bounces on $x_{1}$.

s|Also: $x_1$ is a mirror/reflector.  $x_2$ may be light, lu'e of an imaged object; $x_4$ may be image or echo or the same as $x_2$ if physical object; $x_3$ may be a path for a bounced object; ka is reflection.  See also {catlu}, {viska}, {lenjo}, {pensi}.
s|$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ (default 1) long local distance unit(s) [non-metric], $x_{3}$ subunits, standard $x_{4}$.
s|(additional subunit places may be added as $x_5$, $x_6$, ...); See also {mitre}, {kilto}, {clani}, {ganra}, {condi}, {rotsu}, {rupnu}, {fepni}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}, {kramu}.
s|$x_{1}$ is a machine for use/function $x_{2}$; [automated apparatus, without direct function control].

s|Also machinery/mechanism; a machine is initiated/triggered by an agent/force, but thereafter performs its function automatically; if self-directed, (a minji is an) entity (= {zukte}).  See also {cabra}, {matra}, {tutci}, {zukte}, {pilno}, {skami}.
$x_{1}$ issues commands/orders to $x_{2}$ for result $x_{3}$ (event/state) to happen; $x_{3}$ is commanded to occur.
s|[also: $x_1$ orders/sets/Triggers. $x_2$ to do/bring about $x_3$; $x_1$ is a commander; commanded (= {termi'e})]; See also {lacri}, te {bende}, {jatna}, {ralju}, {jitro}, {turni}, {tinbe}.
$x_{1}$ is mild/non-extreme/gentle/middling/somewhat in property $x_{2}$ (ka); $x_{1}$ is not very $x_{2}$.

$x_{1}$ doctors/treats/nurses/[cures]/is physician/midwife to $x_{2}$ for ailment $x_{3}$ by treatment/cure $x_{4}$.

s|Also medic; (adjective:) $x_1$, $x_4$ is medical; $x_2$ is a patient of $x_1$ (= selmikce for reordered places) ; $x_2$ is treated by $x_1$ person/$x_4$ treatment/method; successfully cure transitive (= {sadmikce}, {sadvelmikce}), intransitive (= sadyselmikce, ka'orbi'o to not imply an external agent/process, though the $x_1$ and $x_4$ of mikce may be self/internal); treatment (= {velmikce}).  See also {bilma}, {kanro}, {spita}.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of jelly/semisolid [texture] of material/composition including $x_{2}$.

$x_{1}$ is a polity/state governing territory/domain $x_{2}$; [government/territory relationship].

$x_{1}$ is a bank owned by/in banking system $x_{2}$ for banking function(s) $x_{3}$ (event).
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ weeks in duration (default is 1 week) by standard $x_{3}$.

s|Re. $x_3$, a week may be more or less than seven days, classically being tied to the time between trips to the marketplace; this week (= {cabjeftu}); next week (= {bavlamjeftu}); last week (= {prulamjeftu}).  See also {detri}, {djedi}, {masti}, {nanca}.
$x_{1}$ pertains to the common Judeo-Christian-Moslem (Abrahamic) culture/religion/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ burns/[ignites/is flammable/inflammable] at temperature $x_{2}$ in atmosphere $x_{3}$.
